maple: b:= proc(s) option remember; local n, r, ok, i, j, k;
for j in s minus {n} do ok, i, k:= true, j-1, j+1;
while ok and i>=0 and k<n do ok, i, k:=
not i in s xor k in s, i-1, k+1 od;
mathematica: b[s_List] := b[s] = Module[{n = Max[s], r = 0, ok, i, j, k}, If[Length[s] == 1, 1, Do[{ok, i, k} = {True, j-1, j+1}; While[ok && i >= 0 && k < n, {ok, i, k} = {FreeQ[s, i] ~Xor~ MemberQ[s, k], i-1, k+1}]; r = r + If[ok, b[s ~Complement~ {j}], 0], {j, s ~Complement~ {n}}]; r]];
T[0, 0]=1; T[n_, k_] := If[k==0, 0^n, b[Range[0, n] ~Complement~ {k-1}]];
Table[Table[T[n, k], {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 14}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 18 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
